vote.text: Amendment SA 422 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 422 proposed by Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S4357-4358; text: CR S4358) To extend the pay-as-you-go requirement.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 422 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 422 proposed by Senator Feingold.
